location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 64: William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra] to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter William Digges Latouche reports on the movements of a suspected French messenger, who has hired the boat of Ally Abdulla [Ali Abdullah] to take him to Bunderick [Bandar-e RÄ«g]. Latouche discusses a plan (made with the agreement of Ally Abdulla) to use the Mercuryto intercept the boat and take the Frenchman to Bombay.
